a10_homicide_and_related_offences.title: A10 Homicide and related offence
a10_homicide_and_related_offences.description: A10 Homicide and related offence count. Unlawfully kill, attempt or conspire to unlawfully kill, or kill another person as a result of culpable, reckless or negligent act. Includes: murder, attempted murder, accessory or conspiracy to murder, manslaughter and driving causing death.

a20_assault_and_related_offences.title: A20 Assault and related offences
a20_assault_and_related_offences.description: A20 Assault and related offence count. The direct and confrontational infliction of force, injury or violence upon a person or a group of people. Includes: serious assault, assault police, emergency services or other authorised officer and common assault.

a30_sexual_offences.title: A30 Sexual offences
a30_sexual_offences.description: A30 Sexual offences count. Acts, or intent of acts, of a sexual nature against another person, which are non-consensual or where consent is proscribed (for example, the person is legally deemed incapable of giving consent because of youth or temporary/permanent incapacity). Includes: rape, indecent assault, incest, sexual offences against children and other sexual offences.

a40_abduction_and_related_offences.title: A40 Abduction and related offences
a40_abduction_and_related_offences.description: A40 Abduction and related offence count. Acts that unlawfully deprive another person of their freedom of movement, that are against that person's will or against the will of any parent, guardian or other person having lawful custody or care of that person. Includes: abduction, false imprisonment, slavery and sexual servitude offences.

a50_robbery.title: A50 Robbery
a50_robbery.description: A50 Robbery offence count. The unlawful taking of property, with intent to permanently deprive the owner of the property, from the immediate possession, control, custody or care of a person, accompanied by the use, or threatened use, of immediate force or violence. Includes: aggravated robbery and non-aggravated robbery.

a60_blackmail_and_extortion.title: A60 Blackmail and extortion
a60_blackmail_and_extortion.description: A60 Blackmail and extortion offence count. The unlawful demanding of money, property, or any other benefit from another person, accompanied by the threat of coercive measures if the demand is not met. Coercive measures may include divulging information about a person, or the use, or threatened use of force or violence if the demand is not met. Includes: blackmail and extortion.

a70_stalking_harassment_and_threatening_.title: A70 Stalking, harassment and threatening behaviour
a70_stalking_harassment_and_threatening_.description: A70 Stalking, harassment and threatening behaviour offence count. Acts intended to cause physical or mental harm, or arouse apprehension or fear through a repeated course of unreasonable conduct. This includes actions that are intended to harass, threaten or invade the privacy of an individual. Includes: stalking, harassment and private nuisance, and threatening behaviour.

a80_dangerous_and_negligent_acts_endange.title: A80 Dangerous and negligent acts endangering people
a80_dangerous_and_negligent_acts_endange.description: A80 Dangerous and negligent acts endangering people offence count. Dangerous or negligent acts which, though not intended to cause harm, actually or potentially result in injury to oneself or another person. Includes: dangerous driving, neglect or ill treatment of people, throw or discharge object endangering people and other dangerous or negligent acts endangering people.

b10_arson.title: B10 Arson
b10_arson.description: B10 Arson offence count. Intentionally and without lawful excuse destroying or damaging property by fire and intentionally or recklessly causing a bushfire. Includes: cause damage by fire, cause a bushfire and other fire related offences.

b20_property_damage.title: B20 Property damage
b20_property_damage.description: B20 Property damage offence count. The wilful and unlawful destruction, damage or defacement of public or private property. Includes: criminal damage, graffiti and other property damage offences.

b30_burglary_break_and_enter.title: B30 Burglary/Break and enter
b30_burglary_break_and_enter.description: B30 Burglary/Break and enter offence count. The unlawful entry of a structure with the intent to commit an offence, where the entry is either forced or unforced. Includes: aggravated burglary and non-aggravated burglary.

b40_theft.title: B40 Theft
b40_theft.description: B40 Theft offence count. The unlawful taking or obtaining of money or goods, not involving the use of force, threat of force or violence, coercion or deception, with the intent to permanently or temporarily deprive the owner of the use of the money or goods, or the receiving or handling of money or goods obtained unlawfully. Includes: motor vehicle theft, steal from a motor vehicle, steal from a retail store, theft of a bicycle, receiving or handling stolen goods, fare evasion and other theft.

b50_deception.title: B50 Deception
b50_deception.description: B50 Deception offence count. Offences involving a dishonest act or omission carried out with the purpose of deceiving to obtain a benefit or avoid a disbenefit. Includes: forgery and counterfeiting, possess equipment to make false instrument, obtain benefit by deception, state false information, deceptive business practices, professional malpractice and misrepresentation, and other deception offences.

b60_bribery.title: B60 Bribery
b60_bribery.description: B60 Bribery offence count. The offering, giving or accepting of a bribe involving a government official whilst exercising his or her official authority. Includes: bribery of officials.

c10_drug_dealing_and_trafficking.title: C10 Drug dealing and trafficking
c10_drug_dealing_and_trafficking.description: C10 Drug dealing and trafficking offence count. Dealing and trafficking of drugs or other substances prohibited under legislation. Includes: drug dealing and drug trafficking.

c20_cultivate_or_manufacture_drugs.title: C20 Cultivate or manufacture drugs
c20_cultivate_or_manufacture_drugs.description: C20 Cultivate or manufacture drugs offence count. Cultivating or manufacturing of drugs or other substances prohibited under legislation. Includes: cultivate drugs, manufacture drugs and possess drug manufacturing equipment or precursor.

c30_drug_use_and_possession.title: C30 Drug use and possession
c30_drug_use_and_possession.description: C30 Drug use and possession offence count. Use and possession of drugs or other substances prohibited under legislation. Includes: drug use and drug possession.

c90_other_drug_offences.title: C90 Other drug offences
c90_other_drug_offences.description: C90 Other drug offence count. Drug offences not elsewhere classified in division C. Includes: other drug offences.

d10_weapons_and_explosives_offences.title: D10 Weapons and explosives offences
d10_weapons_and_explosives_offences.description: D10 Weapons and explosives offence count. Offences involving prohibited or regulated weapons and explosives. Includes: firearms offences, prohibited and controlled weapons offences and explosives offences.

d20_disorderly_and_offensive_conduct.title: D20 Disorderly and offensive conduct
d20_disorderly_and_offensive_conduct.description: D20 Disorderly and offensive conduct offence count. Offences involving personal conduct that is disorderly, indicative of criminal intent or is deemed offensive to members of the public. Includes: riot and affray, drunk and disorderly in public, offensive conduct, offensive language, criminal intent and disorderly conduct.

d30_public_nuisance_offences.title: D30 Public nuisance offences
d30_public_nuisance_offences.description: D30 Public nuisance offence count. Acts involving the contravention of public order and harmony. Includes: privacy offences, hoaxes, begging, defamation and libel, improper movement on public or private space and other public nuisance offences.

d40_public_security_offences.title: D40 Public security offences
d40_public_security_offences.description: D40 Public security offence count. An act or omission that is deemed to be prejudicial to the effective carrying out of government operations specifically concerned with maintaining government security. Includes: immigration offences, sabotage, hacking, terrorism offences and other public security offences.

e10_justice_procedures.title: E10 Justice procedures
e10_justice_procedures.description: E10 Justice procedures offence count. An act or omission that is deemed to be prejudicial to the effective carrying out of justice procedures. Includes: escape custody, fail to appear and resist or hinder officer.

e20_breaches_of_orders.title: E20 Breaches of orders
e20_breaches_of_orders.description: E20 Breaches of orders offence count. An act or omission breaching the conditions of an order. This includes breaches of family violence orders, intervention orders, bail conditions and other orders. Includes: breach of family violence order, breach of intervention order, breach of bail conditions and breaches of other orders.

f10_regulatory_driving_offences.title: F10 Regulatory driving offences
f10_regulatory_driving_offences.description: F10 Regulatory driving offence count. Offences relating to vehicles and most forms of traffic, including offences pertaining to the licensing, registration, roadworthiness or use of vehicles and bicycle offences. Includes: drink driving, drug driving, speeding offences, parking offences, licensing offences, registration and roadworthiness offences and other regulatory driving offences.

f20_transport_regulation_offences.title: F20 Transport regulation offences
f20_transport_regulation_offences.description: F20 Transport regulation offence count. Offences relating to breaches of transport regulations. Includes: public transport regulations, offences, aviation regulations offences, maritime regulations offences, pedestrian offences and other transport regulations offences.

f30_other_government_regulatory_offences.title: F30 Other government regulatory offences
f30_other_government_regulatory_offences.description: F30 Other government regulatory offence count. Offences regulated by government not including driving or transport regulation offences. Includes: betting and gaming offences, commercial regulation offences, liquor and tobacco licensing offences, pornography and censorship offences, intellectual property offences, prostitution offences and other government regulation offences.

f90_miscellaneous_offences.title: F90 Miscellaneous offences
f90_miscellaneous_offences.description: F90 Miscellaneous offence count. All other offences not elsewhere classified. Includes: environmental offences, public health and safety offences, cruelty to animals, dangerous substance offences, other and miscellaneous offences.

total_division_a_offences.title: Total offence count: (A)
total_division_a_offences.description: Total offence count: (A) Against the person.

total_division_b_offences.title: Total offence count: (B)
total_division_b_offences.description: Total offence count: (B) Property and deception.

total_division_d_offences.title: Total offence count: (D)
total_division_d_offences.description: Total offence count: (D) Public order and security.
